headline: Netflix CPO Eunice Kim joins TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 to talk scaling product and reimagining entertainment
summary: At TechCrunch Disrupt 2025, Netflix chief product officer Eunice Kim will be joining the Disrupt Stage to share Netflix's evolving story and what's to come.

raw.headline: Netflix CPO Eunice Kim joins TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 to talk scaling product and reimagining entertainment
raw.summary: At TechCrunch Disrupt 2025, Netflix chief product officer Eunice Kim will be joining the Disrupt Stage to share Netflix's evolving story and what's to come.

headline: Wall Street Analysts See Netflix (NFLX) as a Buy: Should You Invest?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), Netflix (NFLX) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?

raw.headline: Wall Street Analysts See Netflix (NFLX) as a Buy: Should You Invest?
raw.summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), Netflix (NFLX) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?

headline: Portfolio Positioning For An Uncertain Market With Next Gen Investors
summary: Rob Isbitts from Sungarden Investors Club talks again to analysts Julia Ostian, Jack Bowman, and Kenio Fontes about buying dips, market positioning and yield curve steepening.

raw.headline: Portfolio Positioning For An Uncertain Market With Next Gen Investors
raw.summary: Rob Isbitts from Sungarden Investors Club talks again to analysts Julia Ostian, Jack Bowman, and Kenio Fontes about buying dips, market positioning and yield curve steepening.

headline: Netflix updates its Moments feature to give users greater control over scene clipping
summary: With the new Moments update, Netflix users now have the option to adjust where each scene clip ends.

raw.headline: Netflix updates its Moments feature to give users greater control over scene clipping

headline: Do You Believe in Netflix’s (NFLX) Strong and Sustainable Competitive Advantages?
summary: Loomis Sayles, an investment management company, released its “Growth Fund” second-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. In the second quarter, the fund returned 18.58% compared to 17.84% for the Russell 1000 Growth Index. The fund focused on a highly selective, long-term private equity approach to investing.
